INNTEKT_GRUNNLAG_DESCRIPTION: * The earnings for this year are based on your pensionable income from {{year}}.
UFORE_GRUNNLAG_DESCRIPTION: * The earnings for this year are based on the fact that you had disability benefits in {{year}}.
FORSTEGANGSTJENESTE_GRUNNLAG_DESCRIPTION: * Earnings for this year are based on your first-time military service in {{year}}.
DAGPENGER_GRUNNLAG_DESCRIPTION: * The earnings for this year are based on the fact that you received unemployment benefits in {{year}}.
OMSORGSOPPTJENING_GRUNNLAG_DESCRIPTION: * The earnings for this year are based on the fact that you had care for children under 6 years of age or other care work in {{year}}.  Siden omsorgsopptjeningen var større enn din inntekt dette året, er det denne som danner grunnlaget for opptjeningen.
NO_GRUNNLAG_DESCRIPTION: * We have no registered income from {{year}}, and it is therefore not possible to calculate the earnings for this year.
